values: Yes, I'm home... Tension ran a little high at the end there, but it is okay now. I love my family, you all know I do, but WOW there are some bratty little children! I am glad to be home. It was, indeed nice to relax.
I am going out to the boat this weekend. No one shall see hide nor hair of me for a few days. The few who have my parsonal contact info, you know how to reach me.

Yes, David Bowie... Who wanted to be prime minister because, and I quote, "Britan would benefit from a fascist leader." NOT KIDDING. I say this with the same seriousness I would use when telling people I once had a friend who celebrated Curt (sp?) Cobain's birthday by eating Macaroni-and-Cheese, because it was Cobain's favorite food. Or in saying that I really, really, want to go to Finland and I want to have a band called 'J.R. Med School' and tour the continent of Europe with the bands HIM, The 69 Eyes, Negative (As long as they do their old stuff), and Nightwish (As long as they do covers of when they had Tarja). 

Seriously. I think I'm still high from yesterday. And someone made me thier friend!!! 
(Thank you, vincent_heart.) I'm kinda retarded when it comes to things like that, I know. So, I friended them back! (Giggles stupidly.) Sorry, I'm not usually like this. I am usually chalk-full of philosophy and deep questions about the universe and religeon. Not today.

Yay!! Hanoi Rocks just saved me from drowning. 

In the real dark night of the soul
It's always 3 a.m.
It's always darkest before the dawn
It never dawned on me
At my weakest I'm pretending to be strong
Sometimes the demons are too hard to control

IN MY DARKEST MOMENT
SOMETHING TAKES ME OVER, MAKES ME TURN A COLD SHOULDER
IN MY DARKEST MOMENT
I NEED A REVELATION, DIVINE ILLUMINATION TO COME MY WAY

Just when I thought I was me
It just wasn't me talkin'
And the last one that I'd ever wanna hurt
Stood right in my way
Hating is easy and loving takes real character
Love ain't in fashion in this hard stone cold hearted world

IN MY DARKEST MOMENT
SOMETHING TAKES ME OVER AND I DON'T KNOW WHY
IN MY DARKEST MOMENT
I PRAY FOR REVELATION, DIVINE ILLUMINATION TO COME MY WAY

(The pain, the grief, the agony...)

IN MY DARKEST MOMENT
SOMETHING TAKES ME OVER, MAKES ME TURN A COLD SHOULDER
IN MY DARKEST MOMENT
IN MY BLACKEST HOUR I NEED SOMEONE TO COME AND HELP TO LIGHT MY WAY

Let some light come my way... 

This song just made my sad little breakdown go away!
I got all depressed 'cause I didn't know who I was. I thought I had changed too much, and if I changed back, my few friends wouldn't like me. But I got home and sobbed on my mother, who told me that I'm just like everyone else, EVERYONE goes through this, it is okay and I really haven't changed much. Just like everyone, I have matured and been influenced by my friends. Yes, I am NORMAL. (Holy shit! I just said that??) Well, everyine has a time where they feel they need to belong. I just don't really kjnow how. And I'm sorry for guilt tripping anyone today (Cough, LAURYN,cough) and I didn't mean to drag you down. I love you, and I will try to be at the concert, please understand if I'm not.  

Anyway, thats my day!!

Ugh... I'm making dinner tonight, which somehow involves squishy meat in a blender. That I had to TOUCH. 
Anyway, everyone is having problems. Okay, this is a bit of an exaggeration. Not everyone, but most of everyone I care about. I might still be in love with my ex... Once again, its difficult to use that word. God, I'm sick of life. I want a relationship, but I'm not sure if it's because I miss my old armas.  I don't want to get into something just because I'm lonely. I've been lonely before, I know myself, I can handle the game (Thank you, Lauri Ylonen.) The piont is, I need to let someone come to me. This is what happened before. 
Flashback
When I was younger, I tried to make friends and I was damn good at it. I had plenty of friends. But later in those friendships, I finally had to stand up for myself, because my friends sucked and I let them walk all over me. So i stopped trying to make friends. Now, I have the best people on the planet for my friends. And, as an added bonus, they are all extremely interesting. I get to observe them!
End Flashback
So, I have decided to just stop trying to find people. I'm sure someone amazing (Who won't wake up one morning and not love me anymore [ Don't worry, I don't hold this against you]) will come to me in time. Or I'll maybe go crazy. Whichever happens first.

I'm home! God, I'm tired... I'm going to come back to the world monday... But I might be out of it anyway, just becuase of the weekend. I finally get some alone time. I haven't been alone the entire time I was away. The bus was crowded, I got sick of my one friend being near me (I don't like him. He just... Is irritating to me for some reason. ) My other friend had some BAD mood swings... And I am sick of not being able to sleep in moving vehicles! The whole bus ride, there and back, (five HOURS!!!) I wanted to sleep but couldn't.  The thought "I might have to kill someone" kept passing through my mind. Otherwise it was fun. I got a HIM hat (The hoodie was like, 52$, I can't afford that.), and a Finnish-English Dictionary and phrasebook. The guy in the shop was nice. He said that when I go back, I have to be able to speak some Finnish to him. And I will. As of now, I only have curses and other obscenities memorised. Those and 'Kiitos' (Thank you) and 'Anteeksi' (Excuse me). Which I used off and on. But mostly, I am tired. Yay for Seaport village. Yay for I got to see the ocean after, what, almost a year now? G'night.

I got dir of Less_smut_vam. That wasn't working. So, now for your enjoyment, I give you: wide_range_fics. ALMOST no rules. Just a few basic humanitarian things. Actually, just one.      Wide_range_fics. It's alrady got part of a story... I'll upload some other stuff later, but for now, thats whats there.

Hmmmm..... I broke up eith my boyfriend of.. what, a week? Not even that... I feel bad, but I cannot be in a relationship where I'm uncomfortable. And I don't hink I can do a relationship right now. I went through three people in the past month or so... And right after being dumped (I can hardly think of it that way... The person is still so close to me...)  by someone I went out with for about three months. I get attatched to people if they're near me too long, so... Wow, I am confused. I don't know if I want to be loved. I think that maybe, if I stop looking, someone wonderful will find me. Thats what happened with my friends. After going through some really shitty friendships in which I was teased, abused (Physically, mentally and emotionally), walked on, and neglected, I just gave up. For a while I was antisocial, refusing to talk to people. I still do this with unfamiliar people. Sadly, I do this still with people I should be used to by now. But, the point is, once I stopped looking, some of the most important people in my life found me. I want to trust them, but I'm afraid of getting hurt again (This sounds like 'Dear Abby'....!) I'm just having a hard time dealing with anyone right now. And I want to be supportive of my friends, but I don't know how!!!

Wow... I'm tired... No, exhausted. Emotionally. I want to just detatch from life for a little while... I think I will. Not like I'm not going to respond to what people say to me, it's just... It will be like I'm depressed or tired, but for more than just an hour or a day.
Sorry.

This... Yeah, this is probably going to be somthing a child of mine would say... It's so cute!
http://vids.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=vids.individual&videoid=2016876215
Just check it out....
